questionTitle: The bridge goes ________ the river.
Tell me the reason ________ you said that.
I shall be working late ________ office this evening.
Bill has ________ his job and gone back to college.
I don't think he would mind ________ there with me.
This is the woman ________ the artist said posed as a model for the painting.
Sending ________ "special delivery" costs about fifteen times as much as sending it "regular delivery".
I was just ________ to go out when you telephoned .
The dentist told him to open his mouth ________.
You will spend at least one year working abroad ________ you can find out how things operate overseas.
The young girl carefully ________ left and right before crossing the road .
You really can't ________ a thing that woman says!
His house is nothing out of the ________; it's just an average four-room house.
Fortunately, Boston's traditional swanboat rides provide ________ from the city's summer heat.
________ people can live without any money.
In ________ cases it is clear who it is that is responsible for a marriage break-up.
When their mother died, the children were ________ by their Aunt Mary.
I intended to write to you several times, but something was always ________.
He wants to go there and she ________.
I should like to become a ________ of your club .
